about_the_game:
With this DLC you add new simulation.
The new girl add and you can sexual play.

Persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

The topics cover mainstream pornographic themes, such as but not limited to male/female explicit sex scenes, female/female, vaginal/oral/anal sex, toys, seduction, and consensual BDSM.
This game contains scenes of explicit violence.



Execute the following file to start DLC.
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Boobs VR\boobsvr3\Boobs VR 3.exe

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content or themes that are appropriate only for adult.

Themes in this game include:
> Nakedness
> genitals
> lewd situations

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
